bibl.title: Papyrology in the Federal Republic of Germany and Fieldwork of the International Photographic Archive in Cairo.
bibl.note: 1. P. Cair. Inv. temp. 26/6/27/1-41. A Fragment on Rhetoric. Cf. Appendix I: Rhetorical Fragment, pp. 67-69. - 2. P. Cair. Inv. temp. 26/6/27/1-35. Koenen Ludwig, Papyrology in the Federal Republic of Germany and Fieldwork of the International Photographic Archive in Cairo.
